text: But Jehosheba 11:2 Jehosheba is a variant of Jehoshabeath; see 2 Chronicles 22:11. daughter of King Joram,11:2 Joram is a variant spelling of Jehoram. the sister of Ahaziah, took Joash son of Ahaziah and stole him away from among the sons of the king who were being murdered. She put him and his nurse in a bedroom to hide him from Athaliah, and he was not killed.
